product_name: Rocky Mounts Clutch SD Truck Bike Mount
long_description: The RockyMounts Clutch SD truck fork mount is a bolt-on application for securely carrying your bicycle in the bed of your pickup truck or trailer. For use with 100mm-standard quick-release skewers/bikes with a 9mm front axle; remove the front wheel from your bike and use the lockable quick release to secure your fork. Designed with mounting plates that fit into channels of pickup truck bed; ideal for Toyota, Nissan, Chevy or GMC pickup truck bed channel systems. Stainless-steel, long-throw quick release is simple to operate and securely attaches the bike to the rack. Base is made of burly, cast aluminum. Mounting base measures 5.9 in. by 1.57 in. (149mm x 40mm). Comes with lock core and 2 keys.
short_description: The RockyMounts Clutch SD truck fork mount is a bolt-on application for securely carrying your bicycle in the bed of your pickup truck or trailer.
